alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 12:05PM AKST until January 26 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Blowing snow reducing visibility to one half mile or less at times. Heavy drifting snow. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Upper Koyukuk Valley. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility with large snow drifts. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 45 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
